name: src/Rule/ErrorCollector.js
src/Rule/index.js
Rule
description:
The Rule class validates only one value
once a rule is created it can be used multiple times

params.name: obj
params.description: the rule object it describes a the test that are ran by the Rule

params.name: error
params.description: the error returned when the tested input is not correct

params.name: obj
params.description: the error object or string thats showed on error

params.name: path
params.description:
the path to the tested value this is used when
using validator to keep track of the prop value ex: obj.min

name: getTypes
description:
converts array from string if multiple types given in type
its the case for exemple int|float

name: getRuleOperators
description:
Returns a list of the operators when multiple types given
its the case for example int|float

params.name: path
params.description: the path to the value if Validator is used

name: testEntryObject
description:
Tests the validity of the constructor object
thows an error if the object is invalid

name: testEntryObjectOneType
description:
Tests the validity of the constructor object
thows an error if the object is invalid
tests if all the keys are valid

name: getError
description: returns a list of errors if they are present

name: addCustom
description: Add custom rule to the Rule class
